law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 50, effective April 9, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 297, sec. 2, effective April 8, 1994.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Moratorium ending April 8, 1996, on levying of mandatory fines and penalties pursuant to KRS 352.990 -- Exception.
metadata.lrc-note: (4/9/96). The action taken with respect to this statute by 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 308 was to have become effective April 8, 1996, under Section 51 of that Act. The Act, however, did not become effective until April 9, 1996, when the Governor's signed copy of the Act was filed with the Secretary of State.
